page.title: Stocks Lower as JP Morgan Weighs on Dow
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks opened lower on Wednesday, with weaker-than-expected earnings from J.P. Morgan Chase Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JPM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JPM.N</A>, and an investigation into the insurance industry among the factors weighing on Wall Street.
